sqlMap.select: select ID, USER_ACCOUNT, ORDER_NO, PROJECT_LISTING_CODE, RANK_TYPE, RANK_VALUE, SERVICE_ATTITUDE, LOGISTICS_SPEED, MEMO, CREATOR, GMT_CREATE from USER_CREDIT_LOG where ID = #id:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT seq_USER_CREDIT_LOG.NextVal AS VALUE FROM DUAL
insert into USER_CREDIT_LOG( ID, USER_ACCOUNT, ORDER_NO,PROJECT_LISTING_CODE, RANK_TYPE, RANK_VALUE, SERVICE_ATTITUDE, LOGISTICS_SPEED, MEMO, CREATOR, GMT_CREATE) values ( #id:DECIMAL# , #userAccount:VARCHAR#, #orderNo:VARCHAR#,#projectListingCode:VARCHAR#, #rankType:DECIMAL#, #rankValue:DECIMAL#, #serviceAttitude:DECIMAL#,#logisticsSpeed:DECIMAL#, #memo:VARCHAR#, #creator:VARCHAR#, sysdate)
